channel.title: Help with mystery box please
channel.description:
Well i'm adding the mystery box lottery thing to my server using this snippet - http://pastebin.com/p9Fw0Luy
But when i add this code [code] if(itemId == 6199) { c.givereward(); }[/code] (i put it where it tells me to on the snippet) (First part worked perfectly) I get this error: [IMG]http://i1188.photobucket.com/albums/z417/marley2k9/Untitled.png[/img] My rsps is a 317 PI
I'm new to all this stuff, so please don't flame

item.title: Help with mystery box please
item.dc:creator: @Project-Crusade Project-Crusade
item.description:
@Project-Crusade wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:2, topic:401507”]Did you add in this part?

public void givereward() { if (getItems().playerHasItem(6199)) { getItems().deleteItem(6199, 1); getItems().addItem(randomlottery(), 1); } else { sendMessage("You need 2 free slots."); } }[/quote]

Yeah i did

EDIT: Problem Solved, close/lock thread please.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with mystery box please
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Did you add in this part?

public void givereward() { if (getItems().playerHasItem(6199)) { getItems().deleteItem(6199, 1); getItems().addItem(randomlottery(), 1); } else { sendMessage("You need 2 free slots."); } }

Read full topic
